{"id":932358209,"question_id":2661,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681284631,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/932358209/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Missing Non-negative Integer After Operations","memory":"59.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findSmallestInteger(int[] nums, int value) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int[] bool = new int[value];\n        \n        for(int n : nums){\n            int mod = n%value;\n            if(mod<0)\n                mod+=value;\n            bool[mod]++;\n            \n        }\n\n        int stop = 0;\n        \n        for(int j=0; j<value; j++){\n\n            if(bool[j]<bool[stop])\n                stop=j;\n        }\n        \n        return value*bool[stop] + stop;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-missing-non-negative-integer-after-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
